overview: David Leddick is an actor, novelist and playwright who wrote a one-man musical stage show about his 20 year friendship with Quentin Crisp, titled 'Quentin & I,' which he has performed in New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles and other cities. 'Becoming Quentin' is the documentary that followed Leddick during the process he went through creating the show.
title: Becoming Quentin
